short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change negative value color in Google finance. Based on article 'It’s the Little Things That Can Color an Investor’s Outlook'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Based on article 'It’s the Little Things That Can Color an Investor’s Outlook' by Jason Zweig of wsj.com citing research by  finance scholars William Bazley and Henrik Cronqvist of the University of Miami, along with marketing professor Milica Mormann of Southern Methodist University. Also mentions thoughts from Daniel Egan, director of behavioral finance and investments at Betterment.
